document.full_text: a commonly prescribed alzheimer's drug had no effect in treating patients with a mild form of the disease, u.s. researchers said on monday, underscoring the need for new and better treatments for the most common form of dementia.
document.title: common drug ineffective in early alzheimer's-study
lines_and_colors: a commonly prescribed alzheimer's drug had no effect in treating patients with a mild form of the disease, u.s. researchers said on monday, underscoring the need for new and better treatments for the most common form of dementia.
